deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text: Helper function to check if accounts mapping contains account.
Creates a transfer of ETH between two accounts.
Returns the current balance of an account.
Creates an account if it does not already exist.
Deposits an amount into the senders account.
Withdraws an amount from the senders account.

accountsContains(address).notice: Helper function to check if accounts mapping contains account.

createAccount().notice: Creates an account if it does not already exist.

deposit(uint256).notice: Deposits an amount into the senders account.

getBalance(address).notice: Returns the current balance of an account.

transfer(address,address,uint256).notice: Creates a transfer of ETH between two accounts.

withdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraws an amount from the senders account.
